summary.span: 一个用于在 实例与 RSS 2.0 格式之间来回序列化的类。

span.span: A class that serializes a instance to and from RSS 2.0 format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类可以序列化 的实例，以及从表示 RSS 2.0 项的 XML 文档创建 的实例。Use this class to serialize instances of and to create an instance of from an XML document that represents an RSS 2.0 item. 如果想要序列化从 派生的类，请使用 格式化程序。If you have derived a class from and want to serialize it, use the formatter. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何创建 实例并对其进行序列化。The following code shows how to create a instance and serialize it. span.span: A value that specifies whether to serialize elements that are defined in the Atom 1.0 specification but not in the RSS 2.0 specification.
The default value is .
Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` 参数为 `true`，则会用 Atom 1.0 命名空间对在 Atom 1.0 规范中已定义但在 RSS 2.0 规范中未定义的所有元素进行序列化。If the `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, all elements defined in the Atom 1.0 specification that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification are serialized with the Atom 1.0 namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用此构造函数。The following example shows how to call this constructor. Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否在序列化过程中保留属性扩展。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.

value.span: 一个指定是否在序列化过程中保留属性扩展的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 `true`。The default value of this property is `true`. 属性扩展是 Atom 1.0 规范中未定义的 XML 属性。Attribute extensions are XML attributes that are not defined in the Atom 1.0 specification. 此属性 (Property) 确定是否在序列化过程中写入这些属性 (Attribute)。This property determines whether to write these attributes during serialization. 同样，此属性 (Property) 也确定是否在反序列化 RSS 2.0 项时保留 `AttributeExtensions` 实例中 属性 (Property) 内的属性 (Attribute) 扩展。Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve attribute extensions inside the `AttributeExtensions` properties in the instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 item.

value.span: 一个指定是否在序列化过程中保留元素扩展的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 `true`。The default value of this property is `true`. 元素扩展是 Atom 1.0 规范中未定义的 XML 元素。Element extensions are XML elements that are not defined in the Atom 1.0 specification. 此属性确定是否在序列化过程中写入这些元素。This property determines whether to write these elements during serialization. 同样，此属性确定在反序列化 RSS 2.0 项时是否保留 `ElementExtensions` 实例中 属性内的元素扩展。Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve element extensions inside the `ElementExtensions` property in the instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 item.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否在 Atom 1.0 命名空间中序列化扩展。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.

value.span: 一个指定是否在 Atom 1.0 命名空间中序列化扩展的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 `true`。The default value of this property is `true`. 当此属性为 `true` 时，会在 Atom 1.0 命名空间中序列化 类中不能以 RSS 2.0 格式表示的任何属性，否则，不会序列化这些属性。When this property is `true`, any properties in the class that cannot be represented in the RSS 2.0 format are serialized within the Atom 1.0 namespace; otherwise these properties are not be serialized.
